foreignData.name: Jemandem einheizen
foreignData.text:
Todesopfer 2
Jemandem einheizen fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.name: Acribillar
foreignData.text:
Victimizar 2.
Acribillar hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo.

foreignData.name: Allumez-les !
foreignData.text:
Victime 2
Allumez-les inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou planeswalker.

foreignData.name: Fare Fuoco
foreignData.text:
Danno collaterale 2
Fare Fuoco infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.name: 着火
foreignData.text:
犠牲2
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１体を対象とする。着火はそれに２点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.name: 불을 붙여라
foreignData.text:
사상자 2
생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 불을 붙여라는 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.

foreignData.name: Fogo Neles
foreignData.text:
Baixa 2
Fogo Neles causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao planeswalker alvo.

foreignData.name: Зажигай
foreignData.text:
Потери 2
Зажигай наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или planeswalker'у.

foreignData.name: 全烧光
foreignData.text:
催命2
全烧光对目标生物或鹏洛客造成2点伤害。

foreignData.name: 全燒光
foreignData.text:
催命2
全燒光對目標生物或鵬洛客造成2點傷害。

name: Light 'Em Up
originalText:
Casualty 2
Light 'Em Up deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

rulings.text: Casualty N means “As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power N or greater.” and “When you cast this spell, if a casualty cost was paid for it, copy it. If the spell has any targets, you may choose new targets for the copy.”
You may sacrifice only one creature to pay a spell's casualty cost, and you copy the spell only once.
If you pay the casualty cost of a spell, the copy will resolve before the original spell.
The copy of the spell is created on the stack, so it's not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won't trigger.

text:
Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Light 'Em Up deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
